name: Ramerino - Italian Prime Restaurant
address: 16 E 39th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

reviews.text: Do you want more 5-star Google reviews? Best of all, they‚Äôre free! We can provide as many as you need to help your business reach the top of Google Maps. Contact us on Telegram: @gthisjpeg

The kitchen delivers perfection while keeping everything clean. They create dishes that taste fresh and well-seasoned. Nothing about the taste really stood out. The staff performance and food choices are outstanding. I intend to visit here again shortly!
Great dinner and excellent service

We had a terrible experience despite having a confirmed reservation. The staff seated us at a table meant for a much smaller group and insisted it was the correct size. Our group could barely fit and had to squeeze into the corners‚Äîeven though we‚Äôre all medium to petite-sized people. To make matters worse, our food arrived after an hour and a half. It was basic pasta, steak, and chicken‚Äîdishes that shouldn‚Äôt have taken more than 20 minutes. Overall, the food was mediocre, the service disorganized, and the experience disappointing.
Very long wait for food and they kept filling our bottled water with tap water, happened 4 times over dinner
Tr√®s bonne adresse, service top, les pasta sont excellentes ! Vraiment tr√®s belle d√©couverte
We had a great dinner here

I couldn't get enough of their amazing food. The food pleased me and service was great. Complete satisfaction. This restaurant creates a memorable atmosphere. I gave top marks because the experience was exceptional.
Had a beautiful and elegant dinner last night. Some of the best service and teamwork I‚Äôve seen. Food was excellent!

Food: delicious even their butter was delicious
Service: great
Staff: all the staff were friendly and helpful, special thanks goes to Karlos and Sardi üëçüèºyou were the best
Place: goo, romantic
Experience: great

I had a truly enjoyable experience at Ramerino Italian Restaurant. The atmosphere was warm and elegant, making it a perfect place to relax and enjoy a meal.

The staff were very attentive, friendly, and professional, ensuring that everything went smoothly from start to finish. The food was absolutely delicious fresh ingredients, authentic flavors, and beautifully presented dishes that really stood out. Every bite felt like a taste of Italy.

Overall, Ramerino combines great service with excellent food, and I‚Äôd definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an authentic Italian dining experience.
Great food and service!

What a sensational experience! After a long day of traveling, I couldn‚Äôt have asked for better hospitality. It‚Äôs rare to find service this thoughtful, and I‚Äôm so grateful to the entire team for making the evening unforgettable. I‚Äôm already looking forward to returning and sharing this experience with others. The wine, limoncello, Pasta Carbonara, and Blueberry Ricotta Cheesecake-- all fresh and made in-house-- were outstanding. Thank you, Ramerino, and thanks to your team, for such exceptional service!

If I could give this restaurant at 10, I would. We all ordered a different pasta dish so we could try each other's and not one of them disappointed. It was probably the best Italian we've had even including going to Italy. The staff was friendly and didn't rush us. We got there early because we were going to a show. I would highly recommend it. We didn't even know we were inside of a hotel unless you went to the bathroom and saw the elevator

Fantastic dining experience! üçùü•ó The Cacio e Pepe was creamy and perfectly seasoned, while the Barbaietola was fresh and flavorful. Great service and lovely atmosphere. A true NYC gem! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Food was good but the service was terrible. They sat me at a dingy corner of the restaurant and no one came to attend to me. I had to walk to the counter to even get someone to serve me the complimentary bread. At this price point, you would expect a lot more than this.
Everything was super delicious! I recommend this place for a real Italian food.
Great service and food. Had a great time with my girlfriend. They treated me like kings here.
Amazing food and service. Outdoor patio is great with friends. Thank you Delon everything was amazing.
Fantastic food and service. Delon was a great manager. Looking forward to coming back, strongly recommend.
Love it
We had a reservations and we arrived to a closed door with no prior information.
A carbonara made with venison... sacrilegio. Never coming back, but good luck to them.

We went here for my 32nd birthday and it was absolutely incredible. The pasta was out of this world, the food came quickly, the service was top notch, the vibes and the atmosphere to die for, the drinks were divine. Honestly, an exceptional dining experience.
alda is the rudest manager i‚Äôve ever seen horrible people working there

Reserved for a party of nine on Saturday evening for my wife‚Äôs birthday. We were seated right away and the staff stayed attentive all night. I liked that the room wasn‚Äôt overly dark, and the noise level made it easy to talk without shouting.

We enjoyed cocktails and shared several appetizers‚Äîburrata, grilled calamari, octopus, and a tableside Caesar salad. The kitchen also sent complimentary meatballs and an avocado dish, all delicious.

My sons-in-law split the t-bone for two with sides, while the rest of us had pastas (shrimp scampi, bolognese, pappardelle, and cacio e pepe). Portions were just right, being satisfying without overindulging.

They surprised my wife with chocolate cake and a birthday song, and we finished with coffee, shared desserts, and complimentary port.

The bill was $1,080 before tip ($1,300 with tip) for nine people, including cocktails. Excellent evening & we‚Äôd gladly return.

I had a late dinner here. It is inconspicuously located in a Hyatt Hotel, but once you are inside it becomes a quote upscale Italian restaurant. The staff was outstanding and the service impeccable. The food however was often just average. In particular, a medium rare steak came out quite rare. I thought the cacio e pepe was very good, but the desert was also average.
best. place. ever.

Let me tell you, this place was without a doubt the best place my mom and I have ever eaten at! The service was INCREDIBLE--I mean those people were treating us like we were VIPs, and listen: Val was awesome! He gave me a Shirley Temple and tiramisu on the house because he really wanted us to try it, and he was SO RIGHT, the tiramisu was the best dessert we ever had!!! Plus he was so nice! he told us what everything was that we didn't know, and he was all around a great waiter/server and the food! Oh let me not even get started on the food! We got the lobster ravioli (it was a special) and this spinach salad with beets, it was SO good!!! We are definitely coming back, I wish there was a 6 star option. (from Owen, 11).

Made reservations for nine to start my sister‚Äôs bachelorette weekend with a nice dinner. It was excellent! And fairly priced. Ambiance was beautiful. They surprised my sister with a desert plate and lemoncello for the table. Loved it and highly recommend! Especially for special occasions.  Thank you, Ramerino!
Ottima esperienza da camerino. Piatti gustosi e abbondanti che rispettano la tradizione culinaria italiana. Un consiglio: migliorare la velocit√† nel servizio.
Haris aka Pepper Boy was great.

Some of the best service you'll get in Manhattan!  From start to finish the service was amazing.  If you have a food allergy, do not fear, they were super accommodating!   The food was absolute on amazing.  The ambiance was perfect as well.  Quiet establishment perfect for great conversation with awesome friends over a fine meal.
Best steak tartare I‚Äôve had in New York. Pappardelle was amazing too
Wonderful dinner and service. Valmir made perfect recommendations.

Highly recommend Ramerino for great quality Italian food in the heart of midtown and amazing service! Make sure to ask for Valmir - such a great attitude and so helpful! We enjoyed the cacio e Pepe as well as the pollo di castelli in addition to calamari to start!
Amazing food and great service! Couldn't ask for anything more :)

We had a wonderful time at this restaurant. We went there for my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday and all the food was absolutely delicious! One of the best pasta of my life! And the desserts.. omg the pistachio ice cream was fantastic such as the chocolate lava cake! We will never forget that moment!
Excellent
Nous avons pass√© une tr√®s bonne soir√©e. On s'est r√©gal√©s.
5 stars in my book. Thanks Ramerino
Absolutely exquisite! Everything was perfect. Filet melted in my mouth and the lobster ravioli was delicious. Incredible service and ambience. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Just arrived in NY and came here for my son‚Äôs 21st birthday, and it was the best dinner we‚Äôve ever had! The service was impeccable, and the food was to die for! I‚Äôve never had pasta this good! The atmosphere, food, and service were the best!

AMAZING!!!! Such an amazing dinner the food was perfect!! Literally the best pasta ever!! And everyone was soooo sweet!! Came here for my brothers bday dinner and it was truly the best place ever!! 1000000/10!! Recommend

This was by far the best dinner I have ever had. The atmosphere was beautiful, the service was impeccable, and the food was divine. I can‚Äôt stress enough how much I loved everything about this restaurant. Truly a hidden gem.
The best restaurant I have ever been to hands down, all the staff was incredible and the food was perfect.

Excellente on all counts. Visited here earlier this year and just now finding time to leave a review for this authentic quaint Italian restaurant in the heart of Midtown East. Popped in for early after work dinner craving pasta. Had special of the evening, black linguini w/lobster.  Food was very good, service exceptional and friendly. I forgot my waiter's name but he made sure my visit was a memorable one. If you're on this side of town and craving Italian, highly recommend.
A superb lunch menu. Very pleased with quality of main dish. Was quiet at time , served by Carlos and Valmir. Both very professional and attentive foresaw all needs. Honest pricing, will return

My wife and I travel extensively, and we have been to some remarkable restaurants. However, our experience at Ramerino was absolutely amazing and probably in our top 3 of all time. Service by Anselmo was excellent and the food was incredible. We are looking forward to our return on our next visit to New York.

This place we will definitely come back to. The food was spectacular. I had the pappadella with mushrooms in a olive oil infusion. We also had the Eggplant appetizer. Their sauce was awesome. The service is impeccable they were tentative and gave us bread along with Parmesan cheese and sopressata. Our Cappuccino was also great. overall definitely a 5 star.

We stepped in because we stayed at the hotel next door and it started to pour outside the moment we stepped out. Completely not expecting anything about this place, yet the staff was amazing and the food is off the chart good.

I wish we took photos before we dug in. And the only two we took didnt do justice to them.

Compliment to the chef and to the entire waiting staff especially Carlos who really took care of us.

Amazing food- strongly recommend

We had an unforgettable dining experience at this restaurant! From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel incredibly special and pampered. As we are on our honeymoon, the warm and attentive service truly added a magical touch to our evening. The atmosphere was incredibly romantic, with soft lighting and an intimate setting that made us feel right at home. The food was absolutely amazing, each dish more delicious than the last. It was clear that both the chefs and the waitstaff put their heart into every detail. We felt not only well taken care of, but genuinely appreciated. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking to enjoy a memorable, romantic evening. A huge thank you to the team for making our honeymoon even more special!

A special thanks to Valmir üíô

I had two odd experiences at Ramerino. My friend and I stopped in for lunch in March. Anselmo was our server, and everything was great. The bread basket, the Caesar salad, the elegant service, all had us exclaiming in pleasure.  That is, until my entree.  My Cacio e Pepe was overdone, the sauce looking like it was microwaved.  This pasta was far from Al dente.  I mentioned something to our server Anselmo who told me the pasta is all made in house and must get to the table instantly. Anselmo said I should return the next evening with my wife, and he would make sure we were taken care of. The pasta was taken off the check, but I made it up with the tip.
I returned the next night with my wife and to my surprise, Anselmo wasn‚Äôt working.  Our servers were professional, but we didn‚Äôt get personal service. There was no bread basket, and the dinner was good, not great. However, the bill, with two appetizers, two entrees, two desserts with two cocktails and two glasses of wine was $224.00. A steal for this quality of food and service. I‚Äôll be back, Anselmo or no Anselmo.

One of the best place I‚Äôve ever been to!
Now this is top in my list in NYC.

The atmosphere is so calm and nice.
Service is just excellent.
And food was so Italian and so fresh and amazing.
Just perfecto üëåüèº

Food was amazing! I had the lobster ravioli and the caesar salad along with the lava cake for dessert! It was absolutely delicious! Blendi provided phenomenal service!! Ask for him when you go! I will definitely be back! Thank you Blendi for wonderful dinner recommendations and service!

We ordered Rigatoni Vodka and Ravioli Della Casa. Both were good. They had a giant black pepper crusher. Nice ambience. You can do coat check in front. Overall good food and the service is great too. They served a variety of breads to choose from in beginning. Onion, multigrain, sour dough, etc. I got multi grain. It was warm. Onion was better.

Overall, the food was impressive. The pasta and octopus dishes exceeded my expectations‚Äîflavorful, well-prepared, and memorable. The steak, however, was slightly off in terms of doneness and seasoning. Service was okay‚Äînot bad, but not particularly attentive or polished. Still, the quality of the food makes this place worth a visit.
It was a really good dinner. The ambience was nice and professional. The food was amazing. One of the best pastas I had the desserts were all made in house and were so good.
Simply amazing! I randomly picked this restaurant on the map for dinner and very glad I did. The food was really excellent as well as the service.

Celebrating my wife's 45th birthday in NYC, and she picked a great spot only 7 minutes from The Empire State Building. Authentic Italian meals were delicioso üëåand the friendliest staff. Our server Blendi is top notch.

I picked Ramerino‚Äôs for my girls trip birthday dinner and I couldn‚Äôt have been happier! The staff was all so friendly, professional and treated you like royalty. The atmosphere was perfect and the food exceeded my expectations! We ordered table side Caesar salad, rigatoni with vodka sauce, cacio d pepe and the lobster ravioli with vodka sauce.  Dessert was chocolate crusted cheesecake and tiramisu and the finest round of happy birthday sung by the staff! I highly recommend trying out next time you are in the Murray Hill/Manhattan area! I will absolutely be back!

Una sperienza unica cibo davvero ottimo.
Sopratutto con la simpatica unica di Carlos molto cordiale e disponibile e attento nei dettagli.
Alla nostra prossima visita a new york sicuramente ci torneremo senza ombra di dubbio.

Wow. What an experience.  Skip sitting at a table and sit with Dorian at the bar. Food service and drinks were amazing.  Been to some of the best restaurants in NYC over the past week and this place ranks at the top. Thanks for a wonderful meal.

This was an amazing place to host a birthday dinner.

I kept looking for a downtown Italian restaurant that could host 13 guests without a Pre-fix menu but had no luck. Though Ramerino offers the Pre-fix menu, it is not required for a party of my size. They sat us in the back and were very friendly and accommodating. My friend baked me a cake and they allowed us to bring it in, brought it out to sing happy birthday and proceeded to cut it for everyone.

The food was spectacular and the ambiance was sleek and elegant. If you're looking for a place with a big party this is a great choice. A lovely birthday evening.

Hands down the best Italian food I‚Äôve had and best in NYC. We ordered the ravioli, bolognese, and Cacio De Pepe with a side of Brussels sprouts. Incredible. Our server Blendi was incredible. Ambiance was relaxing. 10/10 would come back again!

Way to start the 2025 year with dinner here on 1/1/25! Food from salad to dessert was exceptional‚Äîwe had drinks, salad, Shrimp Scampi and Limone Pollo and Tiramisu. Not only was the food something to come back for, but the dining room staff worked together as a team, was very attentive, gave wonderful recommendations and just put the meal over the top. Both Blendi and Steve get high kudos from us for their service. You won‚Äôt go wrong having a meal here!
This was such a wonderful experience.  All servers were helpful.  We wanted something not on the menu and they made it from scratch!!  This is a must!!  Delicious!  Kind service.

I went with my parents last week for the first time and loved it. From the moment we entered the staff were so kind, attentive, and informed. We will absolutely be back again!

I know that there is a review on here complaining about the bathrooms, but they were actually quite pretty. They are unisex but individual very private stalls - similar to a mini water closet per person.
Cool place. Probably busier on weekdays, since it's in a business district. Excellent service. The carbonara was good. I wouldn't be opposed to going back.

My family and I had such a wonderful dining experience for my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday. Our waiter was so knowledgeable especially when presenting the specials. The waitstaff was also very attentive making sure we had everything we needed; yet didn‚Äôt hover. The food was absolutely delicious and most of us ordered the specials. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever had better Italian food in my life! The calamari was to die for. They even brought a special dish for my boyfriend and sang happy birthday. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who loves Italian. Thank you Ramerino for a wonderful evening!

Came here for a date night, the food was spectacular. Highly recommend the T-Bone Steak. The atmosphere was great, romantic and calm. Phenomenal service by the staff, our waiter Ancelmo was just great, paid attention to detail and took amazing care of us!!!!

This place deserves a Michelin Star! ABSOLUTELY IMPECCABLE. What a lovely surprise to find New York‚Äôs hidden gem.  My husband and I ate here only for convenience, and were blown away by the food. The food is fresh and perfectly seasoned with an unexpected flair. The chef is from Italy- (need I say more?!?) after eating here, every other restaurant we have dined with seems subpar compared to this place!   And as if the amazing food wasn‚Äôt enough, the service is INCREDIBLE! We have dined at many Michelin star restaurants, and this place treated us better than most of those restaurants.  If you are looking for a dinner to impress- eat here. If you are looking for a taste of Italy, eat here. If you want to be treated like you matter- eat here.  I have dined here three times now, and I can not say enough.
Well done, to the Manager, The Chef, and the staff!

From the moment we walked in and down to the minute we left the restaurant, we had impeccable service from the amazing and professional staff here at this establishment.  Every dish we ordered was amazing and had finished everything except for a little bit of our tiramisu cause we were full.  The carbonara, barbietoa salad, seabass and meatball were fresh, authentic, you could taste the ingredients, without the sauce and dressing over powering it.  Every dish we had was delicious, as well as our cocktails.  The complimentary lemoncello was a nice touch, delicious, and strong.  Thank goodness we switched our dinner reservation to this place.  We had one of the best dining experiences ever.

Best dinner experience! From antipasti to drink, there was nothing to be missed. Food was not salty, and desserts were not sweet; everything was at its perfection so I really enjoyed all the flavors and textures of ingredients.
Thanks Steve and Jon for the memorable night and the service beyond expectation. I will definitely go back.

Antipasti are octopus, calamari and beef fillet.
Pasta is vongole, bottarga and cacio e pepe.
Desserts are tiramisu, chocolate cake, and cheese cake with cappuccino.

Best Italian food I‚Äôve had in NYC! They do not use seed oils and the food taste amazing! Closest pasta I‚Äôve had to Italian pasty in Italy. The service was amazing and the servers are so attractive! Highly recommend and will definitely be back

Glad we stumbled across this spot. Doesn‚Äôt look the fanciest from afar but we were pleasantly surprised once inside

Traditional and tasty Italian food.. with outstanding service

Ansilmo took great care of us.. often coming by to check in on our experience.. and make sure we had more than enough bread at all times!

Got the special of the day - Chilean seabass with asparagus.. highly recommend it. Cooked in butter, its so soft that whatever you can feel on your tongue instantly melts in your mouth

The burrata salad was ok

Friend got the ravioli and found it top notch

Wonderful dinner.  Service was fantastic.  Started off with Ceasar Salad. It was prepared table side. It was delicious.  My wife had the Carbanara pasta. I had a few bites. ..the flavor exploded in your mouth.  I had the veal, it was very good with a very light sauce. The Brussel Sprouts were very good.

It was a wonderful meal. Absolutely recommend.

Had reservations for Friday night. When we arrived we were greeted by 2 friendly hostesses and promptly seated. We were  immediately offered water and brought complimentary bread, cheese, and meat. We ordered a bottle of wine and appetizers. Both were brought out in a timely manner. Our wine glasses were continuously being filled by the staff. We also ordered salad, soup, and 2 entrees. All of the specials sounded incredibly delicious and made it difficult to choose. We ordered a pasta dish with mushrooms and the Chilean Sea Bass special. Both meals were delicious and the Sea Bass was cooked to perfection. Everything was 5 star for sure and were had many staff people attending to our table and did not have to ask for anything as they always anticipated our needs.

I decided to try this place out while on a business trip.  The food was excellent and the service, while not lightning-fast, was polite and attentive.  I had the grilled octopus starter and pasta bolognese‚Äîboth very tasty.  A person at the table next to me had what looked like show-stealing lamb chops.  I‚Äôd come here again for sure when in NYC.
